storyInfo: The most terrifying violence in Ursus befalls the young leader, bringing death, fear, and greetings from the darkest depths of the shadows.

attributes.content: Hui-chieh:
The snow hasn't melted. And spring hasn't come.
It feels like this next spring is never going to arrive.
Each time I lift my head up to see the candlelight, I just cannot help but to reach my hand out to put it out, only to light it up anew in the darkness.
Please go away soon, winter. If you don't go away soon, we'll be buried by all this snow.
Please, I beg of you.
February 21st
Talulah, is something wrong?
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You've been pretty gloomy the past couple months. Did something happen?
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Nothing... nothing at all.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I haven't spent that much time with everyone here, but going by what I've heard from the others, I got the impression you used to be a bit more... energetic?
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Hey, watch it, buddy. Talulah's not often down in the crowd like this. Why don't you try repeating what you just said to the captain and see if he appreciates it?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Yeah, can't say I have the balls.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Patriot isn't as scary as it sounds. The Shieldguards are all like this. Don't let it get to you.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: He just hasn't been talking much because of his throat problems lately... and his silence can be intimidating.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: As for how I'm doing... Don't worry.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Yeah... I just have a lot going on in my mind. Our team is getting closer and closer to the Ursus cities. and there's a lot we need to thrash out. I probably gave you that impression because I've been really trying to rack my brain.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Yeah, you're right. We're running low on provisions, and we don't have enough manpower. If this goes on, we aren't going to last much longer.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: That's right, and that's why we need to pay extra attention to what all the outside forces are up to.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: First of all, we need to make contact with the local Infected groups and diaspora as soon as we can.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: And aside from that, there are bound to be people trying to track us down... If we take even one wrong step and fall into their trap, all of us will have end up in a snowy grave.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: That doesn't sound good.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Of course it doesn't, but as long as we plan our route carefully, we won't find ourselves in that situation.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...So that's why, the most important task we have at hand is to minimize our losses.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Breaking up our teams might conceal our movement better, but then communications will become a problem.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Oh, right, we can't use those comms we took from the Ursus. We don't have their transmitters.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: This will put our liaisons and recon units in unnecessary danger.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: It’s a drain on resources to train someone to use the guerrillas' code words. If we want distribute whole sets of comms to everyone, we'll need to get our hands on the prototype somehow...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Talulah... Talulah! Our recon units were ambushed!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: That's nothing. Why do you need her to clean you...
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Shut up! This is nothing like what we've faced! Poor bastard fell over before any of us even figured out who the enemy was!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: They pinpointed our recon caster and ambushed him with exact precision! We've never seen anything like that from the patrol units...!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: Whenever something concerns our teammates, we can't just brush it aside.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Yeti, take me there.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Shieldguard, we might've encountered an Ursus Army platoon. Come with me.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Yes, ma'am!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Remember, even if they are just an advance team, be extra careful. If something goes wrong, we might have a large-scale retaliation waiting for us. We need to avoid that at all costs!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Understood!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Runner, inform Patriot immediately!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Tell FrostNova right away—Ugh! Ah, *cough*...!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: Kondrasha!!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: You!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Hang in there, Yeti!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Aghh!!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: What...? What just happened?! Quick! S-Set him down here! Take that goddamned spear out!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: (...What's going on? The black spear... grew out of his body?!)
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: (No, it can't be... The Empire's monsters?! What are they doing here?!)
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: *Hiss*...
Ngh, ugh... Ungh!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: What? Think you're all that?!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: I'll show you what for! Let's go! Get him!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Stop...!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: What are you doing? Why are you stopping me?!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: You have no idea... You have no idea what you're facing! You don't even know what exactly he is, and you want to get yourself killed?!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: *Hiss*...
What are you so freaked out for?! We've got this many people on our side!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: (Smashes shield into the ground)
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Ugh?!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Do you want to get yourself killed?!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: ...That's...
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: That's the goddamned Ursus Royal Guard!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: ...To think the Shieldguards have fallen this low.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: Take my advice. Kill yourselves now.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: All Shieldguards, back in formation! Protect the other soldiers!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Remember! Don't give him any openings!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: *Hiss*...
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: There is fear abound in the air.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: The Infected next to you isn't ready at all.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: Don't be afraid! The more afraid you are, the more likely he will kill you!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: He may attack at any moment! Eyes open! Don't take your eyes off of him for even one second!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Looks like I'm leaving empty-handed again. These three cities need to be cut off from the information net for being completely useless.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: Infected.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: Ugh, ugh...! What are you so smug for?! You...
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Surrender to the local garrison, or I will slice all your mouths and noses off and bringing them with me.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: M-Mouths and noses... Isn't that...
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: ...The Liches... The Facerending Liches! I-I thought that was just a made up fairy tale...?!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: You mean... we are looking at them right now?! The Liches that slice faces off of bodies after killing everyone, leaving behind nothing but a bunch of nameless corpses in the forest?!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: How long have these guys been around...? I first heard the story... T-They could only be Liches!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: No, they aren't legends, and they aren't the Demons in the fairy tales! They're murderers and executioners!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: How are we even supposed to fight Liches?! We are no match for these guys! We're just people, just normal people!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: The Infected... called himself normal.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: *Huff*...
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: ...You... You...
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Help... Help me...
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Don't run away!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: All of you, stay right where you are! You'll die if you run!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: He's not even human! How are we supposed—
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: I'll kill anyone who runs!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Like it or not, you're now in the same boat as everyone else. If the defense line falls, everyone will die!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: They are nowhere as terrifying as you think. They're still made of flesh and blood! Not even the Royal Guards can take down the Shieldguards' layers of defense without a tough fight...
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: ...But if you're scared, you will become their breakthrough. They'll start with you when the killing starts!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: We're both among the strongest forces in Ursus, and yet the Shieldguards choose to oppose us and stand with the Infected. How foolish.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: These are truly unfortunate times.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: He's unsheathing his blade! Shieldguards, shields up!! Hold!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: *Hiss*...
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: ...He... He's not attacking?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: ...Something is burning. I can smell it.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: Ahh... My body's starting to warm up...
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: —Could it be... she's here?!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: She's here! She's here! Relax, everyone, she's here! Even the Liches are no match for her flames!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: ...Don't let your guard down! The Royal Guards aren't...
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: You wanted to bring whose what back with you now?!
*Huff*...
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: You hurt my people. If you turn to violence, then we will return the favor—
With violence—
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I see you.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: 3, 7, 22, 36. 【Code words】, 【Code words】.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: ...What are the Ursus Royal Guards... doing here?!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: *Huff*...
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: Talulah... You shouldn't have come. You should've waited for the Captain...!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: You want to know why we are here.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: We are here because we are looking for the duke's daughter. In other words, you. We need to assess the situation.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: The sound of the snow falling to the ground is crisp and clear.
What did you just call me?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: The duke's daughter, and bear this in mind. Given your social standing, surely there are more civilized vocabularies you could use to refer to us.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: ...Whose daughter did you just call me?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You deny the truth, as you are wont to.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: You think I'm the daughter of a snake?!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Anger... and it stems from your irritation... You want to run away from the truth.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: The 'Emperors' Blade'...? *Spit*! You came all the way here today to mock me? Or are you here to kill me?!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: *Hiss*.
attributes.name: Royal Guard?

attributes.content: —Protect Talulah!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: (My brothers! The Royal Guards may be fierce, but there's only one of them! We have Talulah leading the charge, and we'll hold the line! With the rest of you supporting us, we'll definitely...)
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: (...My Infected brothers?)
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: (The duke's daughter? What is he talking about?)
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: *Hiss*.
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: You didn't tell them who you really are.
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: Is this part of your plan?
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: ...Plan...? What plan?
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: How dare you mock her?!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: You better watch who you are talking to before you try to provoke someone and turn people against her, executioner. My identity has nothing to do with the goal we are working toward here.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You can only turn one against another if there existed trust between them in the first place. I doubt there is any trust between you and the rest of them.
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: I can only surmise... You believe the trust they have for you will remain unscathed even after they come to know who you really are.
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: All that coming from a masked villain that carries out covert massacres at the Ursus Empire's behest? I'm afraid no one here needs to be criticized by your kind.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Your words are strong... and confident.
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: If this is as you expected... Very well, I must reassess the situation.
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: I bid you goodbye, then. Remember this well. There is one thing we share with the people standing around you.
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: We have no trust in you. You must take action to earn even the tiniest trickle of trust.
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: Stop.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: *Hiss*... You have a question?
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: You attacked my people. You know we are here.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Am I perhaps misunderstanding you?
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: Who are you trying to rat our secrets out to?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: *Huff*...
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: Which secret?
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: Soldiers, we can't let him give away our location!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (Talulah, are you confident... you can defeat a Royal Guard?)
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: (If we don't do this, we'll face even more losses down the line... We'll have the Patrol Unit and even the Ursus army hunting us down day and night!)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (It takes the Royal Guards time to respond to our actions.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (Only if we bring the enemy in front of us under control now will we have the choice between retreating or pressing forward later. If we want to be able to pick, we have to act now!)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Besides, while we may need to raise our guards against him, we have no reason to fear him. He represents fear, but fear doesn't stand a chance against our anger for our unjust treatment.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: —She's right. The guerrillas have no reason to fear the empire's murderers.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: How can we still call ourselves the Aegis of the Infected if we just tremble in fear? A lone man is no match for all of us, united! He's just a lone executioner, nothing more!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: You are mistaken about one thing... I am not here alone.
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: There is one more of us behind you.
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: A figure wearing a large overcoat stands solemnly on the path Talulah just took.
Each and every flake of white snow, falling from the gray sky up above, abruptly turns black as it lands on his coat, before disintegrating and scattering across the ground as ashes.
There's two of them...?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: So what? Just the two of you trying to cut off the dozens of us? Ridiculous!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Daughter of Kashchey, allow me to postulate that you've come to the following conclusion: Your peers will not be suspicious of you merely because of your identity.
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: Then let us verify the results. If your judgment proves incorrect, then the promise your father made to us shall be considered void.
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: What is he talking about...?
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: What are you people daydreaming about?!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Snap out of it! They're not just after Talulah!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: ...What?!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Do you think these murderers will just let the rest of us go once she's dead?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Protect Talulah!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: No... Protect the soldiers!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: First, push them back! After that, secure a way out! Finally, protect yourselves!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Don't think too hard about it all right now! Just do everything you can to stay alive!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: After all... there is nothing we can do if we aren't alive. If they kill us here, it'll all be over!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Live!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: What you said could not be more different than how your father would see it.
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: ...I am afraid you may only prove to be a disappointment, leader of the Northern Tundra Infected.
attributes.name: 'Emperors' Blade'

attributes.content: I'm not a leader.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I am just... an Infected. I have no reason to impress you.
attributes.name: Talulah
